
[[/Image:Gui-gridlist.png.md|frame|Example GUI gridlist.]]
The GUI gridlist class represents GUI gridlists in MTA's GUI system. It can be used for example as a selection list or as a list to view information about players (see [[/Resource:OldScoreboard.md|old scoreboard]] resource).

The element type of this class is '''"gui-gridlist"'''.
